docTitle.titlePart:
Algoflon
Â®
L206
PTFE Micropowder Additive

front.div:
Description
Algoflon L206 is a white PTFE micropowder
comprising loose agglomerates of sub-micron
sized particles. It is specially recommended for
use as an additive in elastomers (e.g.
perfluoroelastomers) to enhance tear resistance
at elevated temperatures and increase mould
release properties.
Algoflon L206 exhibits excellent chemical and
heat resistance, low surface energy and low
coefficent of friction.
Refer to Table 1 for Algoflon L206 properties.
